why would you ask for a copy without hardcoded subs?

@ abhikrit

Hello ! The reason why is simply because a few people on this planet don't live in a country where english is mainly spoken. For example, i'm french and need french subs... hardcoded eng subs bother me most of the time...
And for changing aspect ratio, that's how this movie has been shot.

FYI: English subs are hardcoded on the actual blu-ray.

http://forum.blu-ray.com/blu-ray-movies-north-america/173095-biutiful-javier-bardem-may-31st-2.html
Once again, your 'actual bluray' meaning the one sold in your precious americunt speaking world. I doubt most of the blurays have english hardcoded subs
There's no goddamn rip without crappy hardcoded subs?! Really?! OMG!
